OOC: YES! I (After 3 hours of Hard Labor) Have finally completed my story 
line! This will be Its beginning. Please Read!

:::Child Dove into the warm north Indian Ocean and swam down 100 feet to the 
Gate of his Fathers new base. He returned to the surface and yelled:::

Child: "Hey SkySchorchers, Gigatron. Come on!"

:::He dove back down and entered the base. there his Parents and new sister 
greeted him. Data and Defection spoke of how heed grown. And they all swapped 
stories. Then Herald Spoke To all of them:::

Herald: 'it is Time, I can no longer take complete control of this Mission. I 
hand down leader ship to My son Child! We will respect you like an elder and 
follow your orders!"

:::Child was great full but he had t do something before he excepted:::

Child: "I must wait to except, father I need all the keepers here, We are 
waiting for Gigatron and A few new recruits, The Sky Scorchers. When they are 
here then i will Except and Perform a Merical!"

In the Back of Child's Head Convex spoke

You Must make your followers Organic! Then you can Begin the Mission and 
create The Republic Of Heaven!
